This document tests multiline tables.

.Multiline Example Table
|===
| Section | Details

| Introduction +
A brief paragraph about the section.

| List Cell +
* First item
* Second item

| Code Cell +
[source,js]
----
def hello
  puts 'hello'
end
----

| Admonition Cell +
====
TIP: This is a tip inside the cell.
====

|===

End of document.
